Articles.Content:
I've noticed when i launch, and i look at kerbin it really lags a lot. I try to edit the graphics settings and that doesn't fix anything.

The vab, tracking center and everything else all run fine.

I have a radeon rx 580, any help is appreciated.

Edited February 24, 2023 by Catto
Same here with a radeon rx 570. Absolutely fine as long as I don't look at Kerbin.

RX580 same problem, practically unplayable when looking at Kerbin. I have issues with other games (Running Unreal engine) that are supposedly  fixed by a beta AMD driver but its only available for windows 11 which I don't use, no idea if it's related.

Tried changing settings to low but no change on performance.

Edited February 27, 2023 by GeorgeAU
I have a Ryzen 9 5980HX CPU with a Radeon 6800m GPU and 64 Gbs of ram and on the lowest settings possible it runs at max like 20 fps of that. Am I missing something ?
